title: Gossip
description: Michael regrets revealing that Stanley is having an affair, so he spreads a bunch of lies about everyone else to cover his tracks--except that one of the lies that he spread actually turns out to be true.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [enters office, somersaults onto couch, kicks over painting and lamp] Parkour!

quotes.speaker: {Dwight} & {Andy}
quotes.text: [rush into office, Andy climbs on reception desk, Dwight holds video camera]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Parkour!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [walking on Pam's desk, then Jim's desk] Extreme! Parkour!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: This... is Parkour. [turns laptop to camera, shows Parkour instructional video] Internet sensation of 2004. And it was in one of the Bond films. It's pretty impressive. [Michael is shown climbing/walking on various objects in office] The goal is to get from point A to point B as creatively as possible, so technically they are doing Parkour, as long as point A is delusion and point B is the hospital.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [stands on his hands kicking open bathroom doors as Andy films, Meredith is seen applying deodorant in women's bathroom]

quotes.speaker: {Dwight} & {Andy}
quotes.text: [approaching elevator, as Michael films] Parkour! Parkour!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Andy! Leapfrog! [Andy leapfrogs Dwight]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Do me! Do me!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Yeah! [Dwight jumps on Andy's back, riding him like a horse] Parkour! Parkour!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Ow! Get off! Get off!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Okay.

quotes.speaker: {Andy} & {Michael}
quotes.text: [walking across cars in parking lot, Dwight filming] Parkour! Parkour!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [crouching beside car] Jump over the camera! Jump over the camera! [Michael feebly attempts to jump off car, gives double thumbs up to camera]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [standing on tractor trailer with Dwight and Andy, looking down] Okay, we all go together or we go one at a time.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Here it is, here it is... truck, to refrigerators, to dumpster, [camera pans to refrigerator boxes, then dumpster] 360 onto the pallets, backflip gainer to the trash can.

quotes.speaker: {Michael} & {Dwight}
quotes.text: [in unison] Yeah! Gainer! Woohoo!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [to Michael's camera] Hardcore Parkour!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Parkoooooour!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Let's do it!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [leaps from trailer, disappears into empty refrigerator box]

quotes.speaker: {Michael} & {Dwight}
quotes.text: [look down, appearing shocked and concerned]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [inside refrigerator box, sounding injured] Parkour!

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [on telephone] Good. Excellent. Thank you.

quotes.speaker: Female Intern
quotes.text: [hands Dwight a cup of water] There you go. Is there anything else I can do?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [chugs water, throws away cup] Yes. Umm... see those files behind Kevin's desk?

quotes.speaker: Female Intern
quotes.text: [nods] Mm hmm.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Go put them all in random order.

quotes.speaker: Female Intern
quotes.text: [confused] Mm-kay.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Then come back here for your next assignment concerning their order.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: This is the last day of our summer interns. It's been nice. We haven't had interns for a while, ever since Michael's Monica Lewinsky incident. [interns are shown gathered around Kelly's desk, one holding a box of tissues, as Kelly cries and wipes tears] He didn't do anything sexual. [female intern opens a jar of salsa for Michael] He just made far, far too many Monica Lewinsky jokes. [Meredith rubs her breasts into Maurie's back] It was just easier for corporate to shut down the program.

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: [to Oscar, motioning to male intern and female intern] Think she did him?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: I bet there's something there. I was with them in the kitchen yesterday, and they were all too happy to be cleaning the freezer.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: If they get married before I do, I'm going to kill myself.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [entering break room] Who's getting married?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Nobody.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: If somebody doesn't tell me, I'm gonna start screaming.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: It's Eric and Megan.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Oh! Hey, I hired them! Matchmaker! This place is like Spaniard Fly.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: They're not getting married. It's just talk.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Did everybody know about this but me?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: There's nothing to know, it's just gossip.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [shaking head disgustedly] Okay... okay. [leaves room]

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: [talking head with Jim] We haven't told anyone I'm pregnant.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Well, with her being unmarried... knocked up by some guy, I mean the yakity-yaks in this office would have a field day.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Yeah, we don't want them at the wedding thinking Jim's being marched down the aisle by my dad with a shotgum.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Wait, there's not gonna be a shotgun?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Nope.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: No shotgun... 'cause that changes everything.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Can't back out now, Halpert.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: What are you gonna do about it? There's no shotgun, so... free at last, free at last!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: No, keep it up.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [approaches Dwight's desk] You'll never guess what I know.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [typing] Okay, let me finish this thought.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Eric likes Megan.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [still typing] He most definitely does. He's been asking her out repeatedly for weeks. She finally said yes. They went out on a group date the other night; apparently it went very well.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [annoyed] How do you know this?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [still typing] People tell me things. I guess I have a face you can trust. I think it's because of my low cheekbones. And... boom. [finishes typing, turns to face Michael] Okay, what is it, what can't I guess?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I hate, hate, hate being left out. Whether it's not being picked for a team, or being picked for a team and showing up and realizing the team doesn't exist. Or that the sport doesn't exist? I should've known. Poopball?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [to Maurie, the Asian intern] Man, I know how you feel. Third wheel. I have been the third wheel so many times in my life. My mom told me something once that made me feel a lot better. She said "The third wheel is what makes it a tricycle."

quotes.speaker: Maurie
quotes.text: What are you talking about?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I'm talking about your group date with Megan and Eric.

quotes.speaker: Maurie
quotes.text: At Tink's?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yes

quotes.speaker: Maurie
quotes.text: How'd you know about that?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Well...

quotes.speaker: Maurie
quotes.text: Did Stanley tell you?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [confused] Stanley was on your group date?

quotes.speaker: Maurie
quotes.text: No, Stanley was with his wife. I waved at him, but he didn't wave back.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [laughs] Does anybody else know about this?

quotes.speaker: Maurie
quotes.text: No.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [laughs, looks to camera excitedly]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: There he goes. There he goes. [Stanley gets up from his desk, walks into kitchen area]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: So, what is the scuttlebutt? Anybody hear anything?

quotes.speaker: {Dwight}, {Jim} & {Pam}
quotes.text: [stare blankly at Michael]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Nothing? Well I got a little somethin' somethin'. I don't know if I should say...

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Just keep it to yourself then.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Stanly is having a midlife crisis.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Stanley's way past the middle of his life. Especially considering his height to weight ratio.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Well apparently, he and his wife were out dancing at a club for young people.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Teri's out of town, Michael.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Who?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Teri, Stanley's wife. She's at an interior decorating expo in Philly. Stanley hates crowds, kids, and music. I think you should check your facts.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [starts to speak, says nothing, walks away]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [entering break room, to Maurie] You stupid son of a bitch. You set me up.

quotes.speaker: Maurie
quotes.text: What are you talking about?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Stanley's wife is out of town.

quotes.speaker: Maurie
quotes.text: He was with somebody.

quotes.speaker: Eric
quotes.text: He was definitely with somebody.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Oh, was he? Well who, his sister?

quotes.speaker: Eric
quotes.text: [chuckles]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [upset] I don't get it!

quotes.speaker: Eric
quotes.text: If that was his sister, then what they were doing was totally illegal.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Drugs?

quotes.speaker: Eric
quotes.text: Making out.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [fumbling for words] Mmm... okay. Uhh... hmm... okay. Never mind. Carry on.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [approaching Kelly's desk, whispering] Stanley is having an affir.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: WHAT??

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I am very happy right now. Thrilled perhaps, to be part of the office, to be part of the conversation. When you have somebody's attenton, and their eyes are lighting up because they are very interested in what you have to say, [Michael is seen whispering to Jim, then Pam] that is a great feeling, and I experienced that firsthand today. It is wonderful to be the center of attention.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [motioning to pad of paper with hangman game, spelling out  "S_an_ey is chea_in_ _n _eri] That and that are the same letter.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Q.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No... no. He's holding a pencil. He could be doing a crossword puzzle with that pencil. What's that letter, right there? Same letter here and here. What haven't you guessed?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: T.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: T! Yes! Yes! That is a "T", and there's another one right there. Just sound that out. You're almost there.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [opening blinds as Stanley walks past] Hey, Stanley! Where you goin', big guy? Up to no good?

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: I'm meeting a client. Do you have a problem with that?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No, no, no, no. I just had a quick question for you. I'm casting a movie and I'm looking for a woman who can dance, beautiful woman. Do you know anybody?

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: Goodbye. [walks away]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Pays five million dollars. Nudity required.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [approaching Michael] You have to stop this.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [giddy, whispering] Did you hear Stanley's having an affair?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I did. From you. You gotta stop telling people.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Oh, okay, I get it. You feel out of the loop, and you feel sorry for yourself, and it's really sad because everybody thinks you're a loser...

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Do you know if it's true? Do you have any idea? Because you might be ruining his life.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [stares at Jim silently, then walks away]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [in parking lot, blocking path of Stanley's car] Stop. Hold up, hold up, hold up! No, no, no. Time to stop being polite and get real. [Stanley honks horn repeatedly] Stanley, are you having an affair?

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: [as Michael gets in car] That is ridiculous. Of course not, why would you think that?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: So It's not true. Okay, well... ahhh, those interns, they told me they saw you at a club, and they all said it was you, it was clearly just... racial profiling gossip.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: [hits steering wheel angrily] Damn! I told her it was a stupid idea to go up in that club.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [nodding] So stupid!

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: It's just that... Teri's been traveling a lot...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: I know, I know.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: And it's been lonely.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Oh, I bet.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: Cynthia's been keeping me company. She was my nurse, when I was in rehabilitation. We used to go on these long walks on the treadmill... I didn't...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Wait, hold, hold, hold... so it IS true?

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: Yeah, but Michael, I'm going to go break it off. That's where I'm headed right now. I swear.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Oh my God! Wait a second, do people often say they're going on sales calls and then go someplace else? 'Cause that's not cool.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: I just need you to promise not to say a word about this to anyone. Michael, please.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [muttering] I'm not saying... a damn thing.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: I'm counting on you, Michael.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [looking afraid] You can count on me.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: [sighs]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [entering kitchen area] Oh, that smells good.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: I might have extra, it just depends on how many I eat.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Did you hear about Angela? That's pretty weird.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Yeah... what do you mean exactly?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Well, the fact that she is apparently dating an 81-year-old billionaire. Owns a Quizno's on the turnpike.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Reeeeally.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Uh huh. [gestures to Kevin to keep it quiet] Alright?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: How do you un-tell something? You can't. You can't put words back in your mouth. What you can do is spread false gossip so that people think that everything that's been said is untrue, including "Stanley is having an affair." It's like the end of Spartacus. I've seen that movie half a dozen times, and I still don't know who the real Spartacus is, and that is what makes that movie a classic whodunit.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Kelly has an eating disorder?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: She always eats my lunch.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Anorexia. She's an anorexatic.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: We should do something.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Nothing can be done, we just have to tell everybody and hope for the best I guess.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [to Kelly] I'm worried about Erin, because she's not a very good worker. I don't know how long she's gonna last here.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Really?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yeah. So... and Andy is gay.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Andy Bernard??

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Mm hmm.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [whispering to Meredith] Did you hear Pam is pregnant?

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: Really?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yeah!

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: She's gonna hate being a mom.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [making a cup of tea in kitchen area]

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: [looks at Andy and giggles]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: What?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: [still giggling] Tea.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: So?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: You would.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [laughing] I like tea!

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: [sarcastically] Oh, I bet you like it.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Hahaha! I like it a lot! I love tea!

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Do you like it as much as you like mens' butts?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: WHAT??

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Because you're gay.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [serious] Who told you that? Was it Broccoli Rob? Someone from Chi Psi? Or did you run into someone from my high school?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: This is not the first time rumors about me being gay have come up. Twice before, actually. Just a weird coincidence... a little too weird. [chuckles nervously] Almost makes you wonder if it's not a coincidence at all. Whoa! Which it is, of course. [long pause] But it makes you wonder.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [to Oscar in break room] Did you hear the rumor about me? That I'm gay?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: [nodding] I did. Yes.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: And?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: What?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Do you think it's true? Do you think that I'm... gay?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Are you attracted to other men?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [scoffs and chuckles] No! But, let me kick you a scenario. I'm at a beach cabana, and Brad Pitt approaches. He tries to lean in and kiss me. I would definitely resist, like at first. But if he was persistent, [long pause] I think I might give in a little bit, just to see what it... felt like.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: [stares at Andy incredulously]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Would I push him away? How hard? Like, what if he's like really aggressive?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: If you resisted Brad Pitt a little bit, he would still... need to get to you?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: It's not real Brad Pitt, this is like, this is my fantasy. Or it's like, not a fantasy, it's just... it's just a scenario.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Wow. I wish... I wish I could help you. I don't... you might be gay. You might be gay.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: What exactly is my responsibility here? To comfort insecure heterosexual men? That can't possibly fall to me.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: How far along is Pam?

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.text: A few months, that's why they're rushing the wedding.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [whispering] Guys, guys... you can't believe everything you hear. Like Stanley, having an affair? That is crazy! It's just... there's no stalking it. It's a weird day for false facts. Let it go.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [with everyone assembled in conference room] Okay everybody, big day. Last day for our interns, a lot of other stuff... who knows what to believe? Dwight, the honors.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [giving envelopes to interns] Present these to the dean for credit. And, as a gift, I've attached my card. Call me any time of the day or night.

quotes.speaker: Eric
quotes.text: Why would we call you at night?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: [grabs card from Eric, crumples it, throws it to the ground] Well now you can't call me at all. Problem solved.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [to Eric] You're gonna regret that when you find yourself between a moose and her cubs.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Look at the intern to your left. Now to your right. [interns do nothing] One of you will do exceedingly well in business, just unlimited potential. One of you will make a living, and nothing more. And one of you [looks directly at Megan] will make a great mother. It's up to you to choose which you want to be.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: [eating cake with Kelly] I am so happy you're eating again.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: [mouth full of cake] Me too!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [to Jim] Tuna, how come you never try to set me up?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Oh, I don't really do that. But Pam might have some friends, though.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Women friends?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Yep.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Not guy friends?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Are you... interested in her guy friends?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: No. I mean, for the record, I prefer women.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Okay.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: But off the record, I'm kinda confused.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Really.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Yeah, the evidence is sort of stacked against me, I feel like...

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Well you gotta figure this out.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Yeah, right?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Yeah!

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: How?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: You gotta have sex with a woman.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Right-o.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: And a man.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Ohh...

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: And then compare.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Alright. [looks around uneasily] Well hey...

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Yep.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Congratulations to you.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: On what?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [chuckles] Come on... little baby Tuna. Little junior toro.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [looks around room nervously]

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: [to Pam] Did you know a baby conceived out of wedlock is still a bastard?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: What?

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: Want me to say it again?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Why did that come into your brain?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [grabs Pam by the arm] Can I talk to you for a second?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [whispering to Pam in corner of room] So, they know.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Who did you tell?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I didn't tell anyone! Who did you tell?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Nobody!

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: [approaching Jim and Pam] Hey, did one of you tell Stanley I have asthma? Because I don't, and if it gets out, they won't let me scuba.

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: If I can't scuba, then what's this all been about? What am I working toward?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: [to Andy] What? You think I'm the voice of the Taco Bell dog?

quotes.speaker: Toby
quotes.text: [to Phyllis and Stanley] What are you guys talking about? I have a daughter. How can I be a virgin?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Hey, has everyone heard a crazy rumor about themselves today?

quotes.speaker: Everyone
quotes.text: [in unison] Yes.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [entering conference room] Yeah, yeah... you know what? Let's discredit these rumors.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Yeah, sure, but... who's been saying all that stuff?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: That's not important, Jim, I just think we shouldn't listen to any of that crap.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Sure, but we should get to the bottom of this. Let's pick a rumor and trace it back to the beginning.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: I need to do mine first. Who's been saying that there's another person inside of me, working me with controls?

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: I heard that from... Andy.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: I heard it from Erin.

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: I heard it from Michael.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [quietly leaves room]

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: [approaching Michael at elevators] Michael? [to others] He's over here!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: [to Michael] Where are you going?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Nowhere.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Michael... [leads Michael to corner of vestibule, then whispers] You told people I use store-bought manure, when I showed you where my manure comes from. Hmm? Hmm? [Michael looks nervously to camera as elevator doors open]

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Don't get on it. [Michael inches toward elevator]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Michael, don't.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Don't... get... on. Do not.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Michael...

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: Stay.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Step away.

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: Come on, boss.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [reluctantly exits elevator]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [to everyone, in conference room] Okay, I made it all up.

quotes.speaker: Everyone
quotes.text: [sighs in unison]

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Even the fact that I'm gay?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yes.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: [relieved] Yes!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: But guys, I'm a victim here too, okay? People here have been saying that I'm a J. Crew model.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: No. We heard that about Jim.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Jim? No, no. I spread the rumor that somebody here was a J. Crew model, and I was referring to myself.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: How is that a bad rumor?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Because a lot of people think that models, even though they're very attractive, are somewhat vapid. It's set our industry back quite a bit.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.text: Michael, why? Why say all these things? Why make up an eating disorder, Stanley's affair, me being a spokesdog...

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.text: [pissed off] You told everyone I was having an affair?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Okay, okay... here's the thing. There was one true rumor out there today. I didn't want everybody to know what it was. So all of you are off the hook, except for this one person.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Well then, what's the one true rumor?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: We have a right to know.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.text: Michael... am I gay?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [sighs] The one true rumor, and this is going to ruin this person's life, is that...

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [interrupting] That Pam's pregnant.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.text: I knew it!

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.text: I knew it! Her breasts were a tiny bit bigger. At first I thought "Oh, she has a new bra with padding." But then I thought "Pam doesn't need padding." It just didn't add up, Jim.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Okay. Thank you.

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.text: Congratulations!

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: That's really great, you guys.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.text: Don't vaccinate it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.text: Who's the father?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Jim.

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: How far along?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Four months.

quotes.speaker: Creed
quotes.text: Who's the OB/GYN?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Stop. Don't. Just...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Alright, alright... you know, this is not the truth, and you can't fall on the sword this way. The real thing is that Stanley Hudson had an affair.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Nope.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yes. Jim...

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [arm around Pam] Thank you for trying to defend her. But actually, Pam is pregnant, and we can prove it.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Yes.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: If everyone would like to see proof.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Okay. [leaves room]

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: Are we just gonna wait here? [Pam returns, displays sonogram]

quotes.speaker: Everyone
quotes.text: [gasps, then cheers]

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.text: It's true!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Look at that! [grabs sonogram from Pam] That is the inside of your vagina! [Jim takes sonogram from Michael]

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: [talking head with Jim] It's clear why we were trying not to tell people. That's clear now. [Jim nods, looking at floor]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [to Jim and Pam] How long have you known about the pregnancy?

quotes.speaker: {Jim} & {Pam}
quotes.text: [look at each other uncertainly]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: A week? A month? A year?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Michael, we only told our parents last week.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Did you pee on a stick?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: I did. It was inconclusive.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: You should've told me.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: [exchanges looks with Jim] You're right. We should've realized that you are an equal part of this.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [phone rings, hits speaker button]

quotes.speaker: Erin
quotes.text: Michael, Teri Hudson returning your call.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [gasps]

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: [in disbelief] You called Stanley's wife?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Oh, oh... yeah, a long time ago, just to make sure she was out of town. Oh... oh God.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: Don't take it.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No, I have to take it, or it'll seem suspicious.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: If you talk to her, you're gonna tell her about Stanley, and that's gonna seem more suspicious.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: No, no, I can do this.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: You can't do this.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Yes, I can. I am going to tell her that I need to redecorate my condo, and I need her help. We will haggle about money, and then I will back down, and then I won't talk to her until this whole Cynthia thing has blown over.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: That sounds terrible.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.text: Michael, please don't.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: [picking up phone] Hey, what up, Cynthia? [lowers phone, looking terrified]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [gets up to leave room, Michael gestures for him to stay]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Hold on a second, Cynthia.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.text: [hangs up Michael's phone, leaves room]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.text: Well, it turns out that Teri was already suspicious, because she had caught Stanley and Cynthia a few months ago. So Stanley promised that he would stop, and he did, end of story. Well, not exactly. [camera pans down from Michael's office window to parking lot below, Stanley is seen destroying Michael's Sebring with a crowbar] Uhh, Cynthia kept calling him, she would not stop calling him, and she was in love with him. Oh, and get this. Cynthia, also married. So... you can't stop love, I guess [Jim is seen displaying fetus picture on his desk as Pam smiles] and quite frankly, I don't think you should ever try.

quotes.speaker: Maurie
quotes.text: [talking head with Eric and Megan] I learned that a company can describe their internship as "full of exciting experiences," even if that's a lie. There's no regulation.

quotes.speaker: Megan
quotes.text: I learned that half these people's email password is "password."

quotes.speaker: Eric
quotes.text: I learned that a ream of paper is 300 sheets.

quotes.speaker: Megan
quotes.text: I thought it was 500.

quotes.speaker: Eric
quotes.text: Oh... I guess I didn't learn anything.

quotes.speaker: Maurie
quotes.text: I learned that if you look even the tiniest bit like Jet Li, Michael will call you "Jet Li" all summer.

quotes.speaker: Megan
quotes.text: [raises hand] Julia Stiles.

quotes.speaker: Eric
quotes.text: [raises hand] Alan Thicke.
